content: captain tracy s watch cap show us what you made on ravelry at littleyeti or tag us on instagram @little_yeti materials 1 skein ancient arts big squeeze or approximately 115 yards equivalent bulky weight yarn 5mm 16 circular needle & dpn 4 stitch markers one unique for beginning of round tapestry needle abbreviations k - knit cdd - centered double decrease slip the next p - purl two stitches knitwise at the same time as if to ​ ​ st s - stitch es k2tog knit one then pass the slipped stitches sm - slip marker over the stitch you just knit this decreases two * * or - marks a section to repeat as stitches at once and the resulting stitch does not instructed lean instructions cast on 80 stitches using long tail method or your preferred stretchy cast on place unique marker and join to knit in the round being careful not to twist work k1 p1 rib for 7 5 decreases set up round working in k1 p1 rib place a marker every 20 stitches work last 20 stitches you should be at your unique marker at the beginning of round row 1 *k1 p1* 4 times k1 cdd *k1 p1* 4 times sm repeat three more times row 2 *k1 p1* 4 times k2 *k1 p1* 4 times sm repeat three more times row 3 *k1 p1* 4 times cdd p1 *k1 p1* 3 times sm repeat three more times row 4 *k1 p1* around slipping markers as you reach them row 5 *k1 p1* 3 times k1 cdd *k1 p1* 3 times sm repeat three more times row 6 *k1 p1* 3 times k2 *k1 p1* 3 times sm repeat three more times row 7 *k1 p1* 3 times cdd p1 *k1 p1* 3 times sm repeat three more times row 8 *k1 p1* around slipping markers as you reach them row 9 *k1 p1* 2 times k1 cdd *k1 p1* 2 times sm repeat three more times row 10 *k1 p1* 2 times cdd p1 k1 p1 sm repeat three more times row 11 k1 p1 k1 cdd k1 p1 sm repeat three more times row 12 k1 p1 cdd p1 sm repeat three more times row 13 *k1 cdd* removing markers as you come to them 8 stitches remain break yarn and pull through twice weave in ends and block enjoy
